    • createProfile

      public boolean createProfile(GymCustomer customer) throws InvalidCredentialsException, DataEntryFailedException
      Creates a new profile for a gym customer.
      Specified by:
      createProfile in interface GymCustomerDAO
      Parameters:
      customer - The GymCustomer object containing profile details.
      Returns:
      true if the profile creation is successful; false otherwise.
      Throws:
      InvalidCredentialsException - if the email address is already registered.
      DataEntryFailedException - if there is a failure in database insertion.

      Specified by:
      editProfile in interface GymCustomerDAO
      Parameters:
      customer - The GymCustomer object with updated profile details.
      Returns:
      true if the profile update is successful; false otherwise.
      Throws:
      DataEntryFailedException - if updating the profile in the database fails.

    • viewBookings

      public List<GymBooking> viewBookings(int customerId) throws ResourceNotFoundException
      Retrieves a list of bookings made by a specific customer.
      Specified by:
      viewBookings in interface GymCustomerDAO
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer whose bookings are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of GymBooking objects representing the customer's bookings.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if no bookings are found for the customer.

    • cancelBooking

      public boolean cancelBooking(int customerId, int bookingID) throws InvalidCredentialsException, UnauthorisedAccessException
      Cancels a specific booking for a customer.
      Specified by:
      cancelBooking in interface GymCustomerDAO
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer who made the booking.
      bookingID - The ID of the booking to be canceled.
      Returns:
      true if the booking is canceled successfully; false otherwise.
      Throws:
      InvalidCredentialsException - if the booking ID is invalid.
      UnauthorisedAccessException - if the customer is not authorized to cancel this booking.

    • createBooking

      public int createBooking(int customerID, int slotID, int centerId, Date date) throws ResourceNotFoundException
      Creates a new booking for a customer in a specific slot.
      Specified by:
      createBooking in interface GymCustomerDAO
      Parameters:
      customerID - The ID of the customer making the booking.
      slotID - The ID of the slot to be booked.
      centerId - The ID of the center where the slot is available.
      date - The date of the booking.
      Returns:
      The booking ID if the booking is successful, -1 if it fails.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if no seats are available for the slot on the specified date.

    • makepayment

      public int makepayment(GymPayment paymentData) throws DataEntryFailedException
      Processes a payment for a specific booking.
      Specified by:
      makepayment in interface GymCustomerDAO
      Parameters:
      paymentData - The GymPayment object containing payment details.
      Returns:
      The payment ID if the payment is successful; -1 if it fails.
      Throws:
      DataEntryFailedException - if the payment entry fails in the database.

    • updatepwd

      public boolean updatepwd(String email, String password, String role) throws InvalidCredentialsException
      Updates the password for a customer with the given email and role.
      Specified by:
      updatepwd in interface GymCustomerDAO
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the customer.
      password - The new password to be set.
      role - The role of the user (e.g., "gymcustomer").
      Returns:
      true if the password update is successful; false otherwise.
      Throws:
      InvalidCredentialsException - if the email or role is incorrect.
